1.title: Balance

episode of.title: The Late Night Experiment with Motown Maurice (TV Series 2012–2015)

1.plot: After Motown Maurice mysteriously disappeared during a live television interview in season 5, he has resurfaced into a new way of life. Shortly afterwards he receives a sign from the spirits.

2.title: Likability

episode of.title: The Late Night Experiment with Motown Maurice (TV Series 2012–2015)

2.plot: The spirits have spoken and Master Juzo reveals Motown Maurice's first requirement for becoming a late night talk show host.

3.title: Delivery

episode of.title: The Late Night Experiment with Motown Maurice (TV Series 2012–2015)

3.plot: After successfully achieving the first requirement, Motown is off to a bad start with his second assignment.

4.title: Versatility

episode of.title: The Late Night Experiment with Motown Maurice (TV Series 2012–2015)

4.plot: Master Juzo isn't satisfied with the outcome of Motown's delivery. As a result, the next requirement has been intensified. This requirement takes Motown body to place its never been before.

5.title: Self-Deprecation

episode of.title: The Late Night Experiment with Motown Maurice (TV Series 2012–2015)

5.plot: With only two more requirements to go, they are not getting any easier. The fourth requirement is by far Motown's most humiliating task yet.

6.title: Visualization

episode of.title: The Late Night Experiment with Motown Maurice (TV Series 2012–2015)

6.plot: Motown has made it to the last and final requirement. Now all he has to do is visualize.

1.title: Signs of the Armageddon

episode of.title: The Late Night Experiment with Motown Maurice (TV Series 2012–2015)

1.plot: Four distinguished men have been called to a secret meeting by Motown Maurice. When he arrives, he reveals the Signs of The Armageddon.

2.title: Call to Battle

episode of.title: The Late Night Experiment with Motown Maurice (TV Series 2012–2015)

2.plot: Now that the Signs of The Armageddon have been revealed, Motown Maurice unveils his diabolical new plan.

3.title: Irreconcilable Differences

episode of.title: The Late Night Experiment with Motown Maurice (TV Series 2012–2015)

3.plot: Motown Maurice's master plan to concur the forces hasn't been received well by his recruits. There are difference between the men. How will Motown handle their response in his moment of desperation?

4.title: Origins of the Future

episode of.title: The Late Night Experiment with Motown Maurice (TV Series 2012–2015)

4.plot: Many have been wondering more about Motown Maurice's past and what brought him to become enraged with so much compassion for late night television. Wait no further.

5.title: You Can Run But You Can't Hide

episode of.title: The Late Night Experiment with Motown Maurice (TV Series 2012–2015)

5.plot: Motown Maurice meets a mysterious person with information on how he can get his late night talk show.

6.title: I Am the Future

episode of.title: The Late Night Experiment with Motown Maurice (TV Series 2012–2015)

6.plot: When it appears all hope is gone, Motown is spoken to by a familiar yet unlikely voice that gives him vital advice about his destiny. Without hesitation Motown summons his crew and reveals his imminent plan for the future of late night television.

1.title: First Last Supper

episode of.title: The Late Night Experiment with Motown Maurice (TV Series 2012–2015)

1.plot: In the Season 2 premiere of The Late Night Experiment, Motown Maurice reunites with his disciples and they are each given new assignments.

2.title: Only in Hollywood

episode of.title: The Late Night Experiment with Motown Maurice (TV Series 2012–2015)

2.plot: The Late Night Disciples have been given their individual assignments on Hollywood Blvd. Now all they have to do is raise money.

3.title: Pitch Process Meeting

episode of.title: The Late Night Experiment with Motown Maurice (TV Series 2012–2015)

3.plot: Unfortunately, the Hollywood Blvd initiative didn't go very well for The Late Night Disciples but they have come together and developed a better plan for The Future of Late Night Television.

4.title: Late Night Infidelity

episode of.title: The Late Night Experiment with Motown Maurice (TV Series 2012–2015)

4.plot: Raj has had enough with Motown Maurice's tirades and he forces him to take his mind off of late night and go on a few dates.

5.title: Journey or Destination

episode of.title: The Late Night Experiment with Motown Maurice (TV Series 2012–2015)

5.plot: Is it the journey or is it the destination? Motown Maurice is on the foul line once again but will him make the shot this time?

6.title: Option Patience Submitted

episode of.title: The Late Night Experiment with Motown Maurice (TV Series 2012–2015)

6.plot: After hours of thought, progress and deliberation has put his newest pilot together to send off to The New York Television Festival.

1.title: Face of Shame

episode of.title: The Late Night Experiment with Motown Maurice (TV Series 2012–2015)

1.plot: Confronted with rejection, Motown's shame forces him to notify his late-night disciples of the disappointing news and he then abandons LA to seek answers about his life's purpose.

2.title: My Little Pumpkin

episode of.title: The Late Night Experiment with Motown Maurice (TV Series 2012–2015)

2.plot: In an attempt to heal his memory and revitalize his spirits, Motown Maurice reaches out to his mom to recap his birth story.

3.title: Adventure Time

episode of.title: The Late Night Experiment with Motown Maurice (TV Series 2012–2015)

3.plot: Now with full knowledge of his birth story, Motown Maurice is still in need of answers. His conquest then leads him to an old friend and partner Scott Curington for a better understand of his past accomplishments.

4.title: Blood Cuz

episode of.title: The Late Night Experiment with Motown Maurice (TV Series 2012–2015)

4.plot: The thickness of blood theory is examined when Motown Maurice visits his Blood Cuz, John "Jphil" Phillips.

5.title: Oprah Gon Know

episode of.title: The Late Night Experiment with Motown Maurice (TV Series 2012–2015)

5.plot: In his last attempt to uncover the answers he needs, Motown Maurice knocks on the door of his first true sponsor, Pamela Y. Robinson. She is the pivotal reason behind the success of The Motown Maurice Show - 2010.

6.title: Face of Judgement

episode of.title: The Late Night Experiment with Motown Maurice (TV Series 2012–2015)

6.plot: Motown Maurice returns to LA, and realizes what he needs to face inevitable judgment before proceeding with his quest.

1.title: Late-Night Scandal

episode of.title: The Late Night Experiment with Motown Maurice (TV Series 2012–2015)

1.plot: An episode of Scandal with Kerry Washington as Olivia Pope and Anthony Tony Goldwyn as Fitzgerald Grant is suddenly interrupted.

2.title: Cone Bone O'Brien Abuse

episode of.title: The Late Night Experiment with Motown Maurice (TV Series 2012–2015)

2.plot: Shocking evidence reveals that the defendant Motown Maurice verbally abused Conan O'Brien in his past.

3.title: Arsenio Hall Hater

episode of.title: The Late Night Experiment with Motown Maurice (TV Series 2012–2015)

3.plot: Thorough interrogation unveils the true reason why Arsenio Hall's late night talk show was canceled.

4.title: Inappropriate Hosting

episode of.title: The Late Night Experiment with Motown Maurice (TV Series 2012–2015)

4.plot: Attorney Andrea Ridgeway forces Mark Sipka to reveal disturbing information Motown Maurice's tendencies.

5.title: Seth Meyers Justice

episode of.title: The Late Night Experiment with Motown Maurice (TV Series 2012–2015)

5.plot: Despite what Motown Maurice may think, Seth Meyers host of NBC's Late-Night paid his dues and in this supreme court of law he gets justice.

6.title: Late-Night Verdict

episode of.title: The Late Night Experiment with Motown Maurice (TV Series 2012–2015)

6.plot: The feat of Motown Maurice's future as a late night talk show host is pending on the results of this trial. History is in the making.

1.title: Confession Booth

episode of.title: The Late Night Experiment with Motown Maurice (TV Series 2012–2015)

1.plot: Motown Maurice meets with a priest to confess his music video vixen sins.

2.title: Public Relations

episode of.title: The Late Night Experiment with Motown Maurice (TV Series 2012–2015)

2.plot: Motown reconnects with Attorney Baychester and recaps his previous media interviews.

3.title: Across the Board

episode of.title: The Late Night Experiment with Motown Maurice (TV Series 2012–2015)

3.plot: Motown arrives at the estate of Kandace Caine, grabs a bite to eat and talks about his acting career.

4.title: Indie MoJo

episode of.title: The Late Night Experiment with Motown Maurice (TV Series 2012–2015)

4.plot: While the wardrobe stylist makes some changes to Motown's attire, he shares a few stories about his independent projects and content creation.

5.title: Youtube Hypocrite

episode of.title: The Late Night Experiment with Motown Maurice (TV Series 2012–2015)

5.plot: Hair and makeup prepares Motown and he discloses his relationship with Youtube.

6.title: Going National

episode of.title: The Late Night Experiment with Motown Maurice (TV Series 2012–2015)

6.plot: British Oprah Kandace Caine arrives and gives Motown the interview he's been waiting for.

imdb.plot outline: The Late Night Experiment fits in the genre of comedy, drama, adventure, reality and mystery. The web series retells portions of Motown Maurice's ongoing pursuit to claim his throne in late night television. In the making of this series, no late night talk show host was spared. Whether you're a veteran like David Letterman or a legend plotting a comeback such as Arsenio Hall, Motown Maurice sets the record straight by indicating who his rivals are.
imdb.title: The Late Night Experiment with Motown Maurice
akas: The Late Night Experiment with Motown Maurice (United States)
plot: The Late Night Experiment is a web series based on Motown Maurice's burning pursuit to become a nationally syndicated late night talk show. How to accomplish such a feat is unknown. Therefore, he is left with no option but to "Experiment."::Motown Maurice
